original_text: And it became known throughout all Joppa, and many believed in the Lord.
korean_text: 온 욥바 사람이 알고 많은 사람이 주를 믿더라

sentences.original_text: And it became known throughout all Joppa
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 온 욥바에 알려지게 되었다

sentences.original_text: and many believed in the Lord.
